nodes.text: JF-86 was a tactical droid that served in the army Admiral Trench of the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Clone Wars at the Battle of Anaxes. Following the cataclysmic destruction of Anaxes near the end of the war in 19 BBY, JF-86 was deactivated alongside the rest of the Separatist Droid Army in a Separatist stronghold on the planetoid PM-6986 in the Anaxes asteroid belt.

After the planet's destruction the stronghold's complement of Separatist battle droids was reactivated by the tactical droid, who had previously been reawakened by a Separatist signal that originated light-years away, and began to work to execute its final directive: attack the Galactic Senate on Coruscant. However, JF-86 was unaware of the events after the war, including the transformation of the Galactic Republic into the Galactic Empire.
JF-86 was mentioned in Dawn of Rebellion, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2018.
